property.value: Vorinclex had no grand plan. The oil did its own work, evolving creatures into worthy predators.

property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) You may have Spinebiter assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.value: (ğ can be paid with either Ĉ or 2 life.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We do not need beakers and vials to test our predators."—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample and infect. (Creatures with infect deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Viridian Betrayers has infect as long as an opponent is poisoned. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To secure a place in Phyrexia's ranks, they hunted their surviving kin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, you gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the midst of horror beyond imagining, I still see things that lift my heart."—Ezuri

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vital Splicer enters the battlefield, put a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield. 1: Regenerate target Golem you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For every one that falls, ten shall rise. The revelation of New Phyrexia is at hand."—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced. Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Metalcraft — Creatures you control get +3/+0 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as my hand holds a blade, there's hope for a pure Mirrodin once again."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With or without witnesses, the suns continued their prismatic dance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.) Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has vigilance and lifelink. 3: Return Batterskull to its owner's hand. Equip 5

property.value: ĝ, Ċ: Tap target creature. (ĝ can be paid with either Ą or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thank the souleaters for inscribing our souls with subservience, to reinforce the sacred order."—Drones' hymn of gratitude

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Caged Sun enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1. Whenever a land's ability adds one or more mana of the chosen color to your mana pool, add one additional mana of that color to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, Ċ: Exile target artifact card from a graveyard. Put a charge counter on Conversion Chamber. 2, Ċ, Remove a charge counter from Conversion Chamber: Put a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Darksteel Relic is indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's the last thing we can call our own."—Minhu, Mirran resistance

property.name: Rules
property.value: Etched Monstrosity enters the battlefield with five -1/-1 counters on it. ĄąĆćĈ, Remove five -1/-1 counters from Etched Monstrosity: Target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now etched only with the scars of phyresis.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Ċ, Sacrifice Gremlin Mine: Gremlin Mine deals 4 damage to target artifact creature. 1, Ċ, Sacrifice Gremlin Mine: Remove up to four charge counters from target noncreature artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Xĝ: Remove up to X counters from target permanent. For each counter removed this way, Hex Parasite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. (ĝ can be paid with either Ć or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drawn by power, fueled by conquest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Originally created to harvest blinkmoths, the hovermyr are now the silent observers of a dying world.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ğ: Immolating Souleater gets +1/+0 until end of turn. (Ğ can be paid with either ć or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thank the souleaters for melting the sinful that we may be reminded of our own insignificance."—Drones' hymn of gratitude

property.name: Rules
property.value: ğ: Insatiable Souleater gains trample until end of turn. (ğ can be paid with either Ĉ or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thank the souleaters for culling our sick so that the strong may earn their triumphs."—Drones' hymn of gratitude

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, that player loses 2 life unless he or she pays 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Attrition is the answer. Starve them, and let their despair be their undoing."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Kiln Walker attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it possesses an ability to understand and appreciate life, it has never shown it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.) Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each Swamp you control. Equip ĝĝ (ĝ can be paid with either Ć or 2 life.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent loses life, that player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard. (Damage dealt by sources without infect causes loss of life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go of your memories and be reborn."—Argent Etchings, plate 106, passage 27

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mycosynth Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oil created the mycosynth. The mycosynth created New Phyrexia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spend only mana produced by creatures to cast Myr Superion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two kinds of myr survive: the powerful and those that stay close by them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.) Equipped creature gets +3/+1 and has haste. Equip 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't draw cards. At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player exiles the top card of his or her library. If it's a land card, the player puts it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, the player casts it without paying its mana cost if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ĝ: Pestilent Souleater gains infect until end of turn. (ĝ can be paid with either Ć or 2 life. A creature with infect deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An invasion weapon of ages past, the glistening oil contained the blueprints of countless atrocities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Add 1 to your mana pool. You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tools and artisans can be destroyed, but the act of creation is inviolate."—Elspeth Tirel

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a green spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Boundless Growth. Ċ, Sacrifice Shrine of Boundless Growth: Add 1 to your mana pool for each charge counter on Shrine of Boundless Growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Burning Rage. 3, Ċ, Sacrifice Shrine of Burning Rage: Shrine of Burning Rage deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a black spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Limitless Power. 4, Ċ, Sacrifice Shrine of Limitless Power: Target player discards a card for each charge counter on Shrine of Limitless Power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a white spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Loyal Legions. 3, Ċ, Sacrifice Shrine of Loyal Legions: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield for each charge counter on Shrine of Loyal Legions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a blue spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Piercing Vision. Ċ, Sacrifice Shrine of Piercing Vision: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of charge counters on Shrine of Piercing Vision. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.value: "Let's show Vorinclex that progress doesn't always need teeth or claws."—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

property.value: Surge Node enters the battlefield with six charge counters on it. 1, Ċ, Remove a charge counter from Surge Node: Put a charge counter on target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without a foe to focus on, the machine priests had time to indulge in new sciences.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from white. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, Sword of War and Peace deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in his or her hand and you gain 1 life for each card in your hand. Equip 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexia is certainly dangerous, but I have to admire some of its innovations."—Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ĝ: Trespassing Souleater is unblockable this turn. (Ĝ can be paid with either ą or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thank the souleaters for surveilling our lives that we may be preserved from our own ignorance."—Drones' hymn of gratitude

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The partisans have unearthed a strange artifact. None know its origin, but it gives them hope of a life beyond."—Elspeth's journal

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Add 1 to your mana pool. 1, Ċ, Sacrifice an artifact: You gain 1 life.
